channel.title: Hollywood Strike on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Hollywood Strike on FinanClub

item.title: 0858 WBD
item.description: score:858 Chances: Warner Bros. Discovery is working on bringing news and live sports to U.S. streaming platforms, which could help increase its subscriber base. The CEO, David Zaslav, is hopeful about resolving negotiations with striking Hollywood writers and actors’ unions, which could potentially benefit the company’s content offerings.
